extendedInfo.description: ** Please note:  If you have any issues after any update, which hopefully no one does, uninstall the app and re-install it for a fresh and clean install. That usually clears everything up. **Welcome to our official app for our site DroidGamers.com. In this app you can expect to find two different layouts that you can pick to have your DroidGamers news and reviews displayed in. One is the standard list format while the other is a nice, more visual grid pattern.It also comes with a slew of settings you can use to customize it to your tastes including different fonts, languages, colors, image sizes, notifications, update times and more. Actually there is a ridiculous amount of settings to play with, in a good way of course.Features:* 2 Different layouts* Customize it to your liking with different colors, fonts, font sizes, notifications, settings and much more.* Save articles you like, delete ones you have read* Share through Facebook and Twitter* Custom scrollable widget* All the DroidGamers news and reviews you can handle* Built-in web browser for visiting the actual siteThere is also a handy toolbar at the bottom to sift through articles in order, share them on Facebook and Twitter and a few other options.If you want to see a article that has more media (images/pictures/video) in it you can just press the Web button and open up our site right in the app itself. The application also comes with a nice little scrollable widget too.This is a beta version and we plan to bring podcasts into this app in January where you will be able to directly access and listen to our podcast through the app itself.The permissions this app asks for are simple for the feature it comes with. Location is for serving relevant ads.

reviews.title: The app is not working like it used to!
reviews.comment: EDIT - All good now!   Not working at all on my GS3 (even after reinstalling it). No articles show up. As for my Nexus 10, no article or images, only a link to the main website. Will change rating after the app starts working properly!
reviews.author: Prashant Singh

reviews.title: Protocol not supported
reviews.comment: Is what I get when loading an article. This means the YouTube embed link does not appear. Fix? Other than that, this is the best app I\'ve used for gaming, especially being able to read articles offline!
reviews.author: Joshua Pearman

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: This is by far the best app for gaming information that you could have. It keeps you updated daily on every type of game that you can think of. I love this app. It\'s a must. Have for gamer\'s. Thanks guy\'s
reviews.author: Craig Mandeville

reviews.title: \"The protocol isn\'t supported\"
reviews.comment: Getting really tired of seeing the alert \"The protocol isn\'t supported.\" pop up on most of the articles. This is happening across multiple devices (N7, N7 - 2013, phone) so it is not device specific. Many articles also have sections missing links to Youtube with \"Webpage not available\" warnings. Please clean up the app, guys.  P.S. I\'d also like a way to receive notifications of new articles for only the \"DroidGamers News Feed\" and not every single category in the app. I don\'t go to forum sections unless I need to so I don\'t need a notification every time someone makes a post.
reviews.author: Edward Vaillancourt

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Great app. The sheer functionality is what makes it great. You will get updated as soon as news about Android Gaming comes out. This is the best way I have found to get updates. I will say it can use a UI refresh just yo clean some things up a little. There are also things that have no content like podcasts. Why even have it? It just takes up space. Other than that, this is a must have for gamers.
reviews.author: Michael Miller

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This is my one and only source of android gaming news!!!
reviews.author: Rodrigo Palacios

reviews.title: UPDATE: Sept.5th 2013
reviews.comment: 8th Update, They claimed that they weren\'t updating because they were at a convention, while all other gaming apps were updating like crazy!  Now convention is over, and whats the excuse, now?  Someone is dropping the ball!  There are so many games coming out daily now, the problem should be they have too much to choose from!  Other gaming apps have anywhere from 20-30 daily updates, why not this one?  Is it just one person?
reviews.author: Neal Zimmerman

reviews.title: Best news outlet for android
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried a few other news feeds but this one takes the cake. Up to date info and keeps on top of sales and breaking news.
reviews.author: Duran Porrata

reviews.title: Just brilliant
reviews.comment: This app is a must.  I almost rely on the up to date news feeds for the latest and greatest of android gaming and technology news.  Install this app and you\'ll never miss a thing again.
reviews.author: Paul Millard

reviews.title: Wors just fine
reviews.comment: Cant find any issues with it so far. Would be cool to have a shortcut to the blogs aswell though.
reviews.author: Kristian Ivanov

reviews.title: Was good before
reviews.comment: As others have mentioned this app isn\'t updating articles anymore. It just shows me links to the website and post from the forums. It doesn\'t grab articles from the main site like it once did. Please fix this. *UPDATE EDIT* All appears to be working once again. Thanks for the quick fix :)
reviews.author: Michael Bowers

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Just need to load latest forum posts without tapping the visit website button
reviews.author: Aaron Chen

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Best app for Android gaming news.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: not working
reviews.comment: just spinning! too bad , I really enjoyed it.
reviews.author: ken lemire

reviews.title: Nice app but!
reviews.comment: This App shows the link to the website in newsfeed and my internet speed is not good.I use this an alternative to website.not to visit to website.
reviews.author: Aayush Kothari

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: This is where I go to find out all the latest new releases for android games.
reviews.author: Herbert Derps

reviews.title: The best & original new source for Android
Does not load
reviews.comment: I like the new design,but the stories don\'t load. I waited three weeks thinking they would fix it,but nope. I even received two updates in the three weeks. So i uninstalled it today.
reviews.author: FRANK LINDSEY

reviews.title: Fix For Constant Loading Circle
reviews.comment: In order to fix the constant loading circle all you have to do is uninstall and install again. Worked for me so it can\'t hurt to try.  Also love the new design and layout of everything.
reviews.author: Skyler Schaal
